title: Express v5 Snippets
description: A comprehensive collection of 53 production-ready code snippets for Express.js v5 applications.
installNote: Install snippets with: npx hanma add <snippet-name> [snippet-name...] (supports multiple)

concept.whatIsASnippet: A snippet is a single, self-contained code file that provides a specific utility, middleware, or integration. Snippets are designed to be dropped into your project and customized as needed.
whenToUseSnippets: When you need a specific utility or middleware
When you want copy-paste code you own and can modify
When you prefer composition over packages

snippetsVsPackages.snippets: Code you own - copy, paste, modify freely
snippetsVsPackages.packages: External dependencies - updates managed by maintainers
snippetsVsPackages.benefit: Snippets give you full control and no dependency bloat

examples.title: Add a single snippet
examples.description: Add the CORS configuration to your project

examples.title: Add multiple snippets
examples.description: Add several related snippets at once
examples.command: npx hanma add cors helmet rate-limiter

examples.title: Add all middleware
examples.description: Add all snippets in a category
